mapper.update: UPDATE signer_nonce_allocation SET status = 'RELEASED', locked_until = NULL, updated_at = #{now}, reason = '超时回收' WHERE signer = #{signer} AND status = 'HELD' AND locked_until IS NOT NULL AND locked_until < #{expireBefore}
mapper.select: SELECT id, signer, nonce, status, locked_until, tx_hash, reason, updated_at, created_at FROM signer_nonce_allocation WHERE signer = #{signer} AND status = 'RELEASED' ORDER BY nonce ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, signer, nonce, status, locked_until, tx_hash, reason, updated_at, created_at FROM signer_nonce_allocation WHERE signer = #{signer} AND nonce = #{nonce}

SELECT id, signer, nonce, status, locked_until, tx_hash, reason, updated_at, created_at FROM signer_nonce_allocation WHERE signer = #{signer} AND status = 'HELD' AND locked_until IS NOT NULL AND locked_until < #{expireBefore}
